name: Sightless Astral Dreadnought
resist: damage from attacks made without advantage

trait.name: Astral Brace
entries: The dreadnought cannot be banished or teleported out of the Astral Plane.
A creature that hits the dreadnought with a melee weapon attack is pushed 15 feet away from it, unless it is grappling or attached to the dreadnought.

trait.name: Giant Stature
entries: Attacks made against the dreadnought by a creature attached to it have advantage, and the dreadnought has disadvantage on attacks it makes against creatures attached to it.

trait.name: Sightless Socket
entries: The dreadnought is blinded and can't be cured by any means.

trait.name: Implacable
entries: If the dreadnought fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. If it does, it loses 25 hit points.

action.name: Timeless Maw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 61 (8d12 + 9) piercing damage.
Instead of dealing damage, the dreadnought can force the target to succeed on a DC 22 Strength saving throw or be drawn into the dreadnought's donjon.
On a success, the target can prop the dreadnought's mouth open for a moment, allowing up to one creature within the donjon to use its reaction to escape.

action.name: Cordcutter Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +14 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. Hit: 36 (5d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 22).
On a critical hit, a target affected by the Astral Projection spell must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or die.

legendary.name: Claw Crush
entries: One creature or object grappled by the dreadnought must succeed on a DC 22 Constitution saving throw or take 38 (7d10) bludgeoning damage, or half as much on a success.

legendary.name: Distortion Pulse
entries: A bubble of distorted space ripples out from the dreadnought in a 20 foot radius.
Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 20 Intelligence saving throw or take 16 (3d10) psychic damage and be pushed up to 20 feet away.

legendary.name: Inverting Escape
entries: The dreadnought disgorges each creature in its donjon, then can make a DC 22 Constitution check, swallowing itself and disappearing down the length of its body and into its donjon on a success.
After 1 hour, the dreadnought reappears in a random unoccupied space in the Astral Plane.

trait.name: Keeper of the Gate (Mythic Trait, 1/Day)
entries: If the dreadnought is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall unconscious. Instead, it resets to 210 hit points and opens its eye wide, revealing the endless, star-filled void within.

For the next hour, a creature that deals 25 or more damage to the dreadnought with a melee weapon attack can make a DC 22 Strength check, gouging out the dreadnought's eye and blinding it on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreadnought makes two attacks, one of which can be with its Timeless Maw.

reaction.name: Spell Rupture
entries: When a creature the dreadnought can see within 120 feet casts a spell, the dreadnought can scatter the magic, forcing the creature to make a DC 19 saving throw using its spellcasting modifier.

On a failure, the spell fails and its magical force explodes in a 15 foot radius centered on a point between the creature and the dreadnought, dealing 11 (2d10) force damage to each creature in the area.

legendary.name: Cordcutter Claw
entries: The dreadnought makes an attack with its Cordcutter Claw.

Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 22 Intelligence saving throw or take 16 (3d10) psychic damage and be pushed up to 20 feet away.

legendary.name: Conduit Shift
entries: The dreadnought psychically impels an astral conduit it can see within 120 feet, dragging it up to 60 feet toward the dreadnought.

Each creature in the 10 foot wide space it passes through must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity, Intelligence, or Charisma saving throw (target's choice) or be teleported to one of the planes the conduit connects to.

mythic.name: Endless Gaze
entries: The dreadnought extends its starry gaze, forcing each creature it can see in a 120 foot cone to succeed on a DC 22 Constitution saving throw or be dazed until the end of the creature's next turn.

mythic.name: Inverting Escape

After 1 hour, the dreadnought reappears in a random unoccupied space in the Astral Plane.

trait.name: Aura Sight
entries: The mageripper treats each creature within 60 feet that has unexpended spell slots or magical items as though it can see them clearly.

action.name: Spellripper Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage and the mageripper becomes attached to the target (remove DC 14).
If the mageripper has any temporary hit points, this attack deals an additional 5 (1d10) force damage.

bonus.name: Devour Magic
entries: One creature the mageripper is attached to must succeed on a DC 11 Charisma saving throw or lose its lowest level unexpended spell slot.
The mageripper gains temporary hit points equal to 5 times the total of spell levels lost in this way.

trait.name: Aura Sight
entries: The swarm treats each creature within 60 feet that has unexpended spell slots or magical items as though it can see them clearly.

trait.name: Siphon Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature. The swarm can't regain hit points.
At the beginning of each of the swarm's turns, it can end one spell of 3rd level or below affecting a target in its space.

action.name: Spellripper Bites
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (8d4 + 4) piercing damage, or 14 (4d4 + 4) piercing damage if the swarm has fewer than half its hit points.
If the swarm has any temporary hit points, this attack deals an additional 16 (3d10) force damage.

action.name: Gnaw at the Weave
entries: The swarm chews at the very root of magic, wounding it in a 20 foot radius.
For the next hour, spells cast in the area have their range, radius, and number of affected targets reduced by half (rounded up).

bonus.name: Devour Magic
entries: Each other creature in the swarm's space must succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or lose its highest level unexpended spell slot.
The swarm gains temporary hit points equal to 5 times the total of spell levels lost in this way.

bonus.name: Budding Spawn
entries: The swarm loses any temporary hit points it has, then spawns another Mageripper Swarm in its space with current hit points equal to the temporary hit points lost.

trait.name: Aura Sight
entries: The swarm treats each creature within 60 feet that has unexpended spell slots or magical items as though it can see them clearly.

trait.name: Siphon Swarm

At the beginning of each of the swarm's turns, it can end one spell of 7th level or below affecting a target in its space.

action.name: Spellripper Plague
entries: Each creature in the swarm's space must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 18 (4d8) piercing plus 16 (3d10) force damage, or half as much on a success.

action.name: Ruin the Weave
entries: The swarm unmoors the very root of magic, wounding it in a 20 foot radius.
The swarm and each creature within 20 feet of it must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 (4d10) force damage.
For the next hour, spells cast in the area have their damage, range, radius, and number of affected targets reduced by half (rounded up).

bonus.name: Devour Magic
entries: Each other creature in the swarm's space must succeed on a DC 14 Charisma saving throw or lose its highest level unexpended spell slot.
The swarm gains temporary hit points equal to 5 times the total of spell levels lost in this way.

bonus.name: Budding Spawn
entries: The swarm loses any temporary hit points it has, then spawns another Mageripper Swarm in its space with current hit points equal to the temporary hit points lost.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kopru can breathe both air and water.

trait.name: Slime Coat
entries: While swimming, the kopru ignores the effects of difficult terrain, and can spend 5 feet of movement to attempt to escape from a grapple.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the creature takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, its hit points are reduced to 0. If the creature takes damage from another effect, it dies if the damage equals or exceeds its hit point maximum, otherwise it takes no damage.

action.name: Webbed Claws (Group Attack)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 slashing damage.
If three or more kopru contributed to this attack, one of the kopru can grapple the target (escape DC 12) until the beginning of the kopru's next turn.

action.name: Glinting Gaze (Group Ability)
entries: The kopru affixes its reflective eyes upon a creature it can see within 30 feet, reducing the creature's movement by 5 feet for each kopru that took this action until the end of the target's next turn.
A creature whose speed is reduced to 0 in this way must succeed on a DC 10 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kopru can breathe both air and water.

trait.name: Slime Coat
entries: While swimming, the kopru ignores the effects of difficult terrain, and can spend 5 feet of movement to attempt to escape from a grapple.

action.name: Manhook Pike
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage and the target is hooked.
Until a creature unhooks the target as a bonus action, the creature is grappled by the kopru and the kopru can't target other creatures with this attack.

action.name: Slithering Return
entries: If the kopru is not submerged, it can move up to its speed directly toward a body of water it can see.
If it ends this movement fully submerged, it can immediately attempt to Hide.

bonus.name: Tail-Barb Lash
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage and the target is pushed up to 5 feet away.

bonus.name: Mindsap Gaze (1/Day)
entries: The kopru affixes its reflective eyes on a creature it can see within 30 feet, forcing it to succeed on a DC 14 Intelligence saving throw or be dominated by the kopru until the end of the kopru's next turn.

action.name: Water Bolt (2nd Level Spell)
entries: Ranged Spell Attack. +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Pressure Globe (4th Level Spell, Concentration)
entries: An opaque globe of crushing black water condenses in a 10 foot radius, forcing each creature in the area to succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or take 18 (4d8) bludgeoning damage and be restrained within it (escape DC 14).
At the beginning of each of the kopru's turns, it can move the globe up to 20 feet and repeat this effect.

action.name: Brine Shock (4th Level Spell, Rechage 5-6)
entries: A jet of toxic brine whirls around a creature the kopru can see, seeking any point of weakness.
The creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 26 (4d12) poison damage and be poisoned until the end of the kopru's next turn, or take half as much damage on a success.
A creature with fewer than half its hit points has disadvantage on this saving throw.
